text.en: Emaho!
text.en-trans: emaho

text.en: Out of the dharmadhātu palace of great bliss,
text.en-trans: chöying dewa chenpö podrang né

text.en: The dharmakāya Samantabhadra and consort, to I pray:
text.en-trans: chöku kunzang yabyum la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessings so I may realise the primordial nature!
text.en-trans: dömé neluk tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: Out of the sambhogakāya realm of the five certainties,
text.en-trans: ngepa ngaden longkü zhingkham né

text.en: The sambhogakāya Garab Dorje, to you I pray:
text.en-trans: longku garab dorjé la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessings so that clear light is uninterrupted!
text.en-trans: ösal gyünché mepar jing gyi lob

text.en: Out of the glorious Copper-Coloured Mountain of Chāmara,
text.en-trans: ngayab zangdok palri podrang né

text.en: The nirmāṇakāya Padmākara, to you I pray:
text.en-trans: tulku pema jungné la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessings so I may be empowered with immortal life!
text.en-trans: chimé tsewang tobpar jing gyi lob

text.en: Out of the blazing palace of the dark blue triangle,
text.en-trans: drusum tingnak barwé zhalyé né

text.en: The supreme wrathful one, Vajrakumāra, to you I pray:
text.en-trans: tro chok dorjé zhönnu la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessings so I may subduedamsidemons and enemies of the teachings!
text.en-trans: ten dra damsi dulwar jingyi lob

text.en: Out of the vast expanse of great four kāya wisdom,
text.en-trans: ku zhi yeshe chenpö long yang né

text.en: The supreme sons of the four families, to you I pray:
text.en-trans: sé chok rik zhi tsok la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessings so I may accomplish enlightened action without hindrance!
text.en-trans: trinlé tokmé drubpar jing gyi lob

text.en: In the Pāruṣika charnel ground upon the ten fit for liberating,
text.en-trans: durtrö tsub gyur zhing chü den tengdu

text.en: The ten self-arisen wrathful ones, to you I pray:
text.en-trans: rangjung trowo chu la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessings so that beings welfare may come about without hindrance!
text.en-trans: dro dön tokmé jungwar jingyi lob

text.en: From the supreme sacred place at the peak of the king of mountains,
text.en-trans: ri gyantsé mö né chok dampa né

text.en: Garuḍa, the king of the wrathful, to you I pray:
text.en-trans: jakhyung trowö gyalpo la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessings so that the eight classes may be overcome!
text.en-trans: dé gyé zil gyi nönpar jingyi lob

text.en: From the palace of the triangle of swirling blood and fat,
text.en-trans: drusum trak zhak trukpé zhalyé né

text.en: Terma guardians, Ekajāṭī, Rāhula and Damchen, to you I pray:
text.en-trans: tersung ma za dam sum la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessings so that outer and inner obstacles may be pacified!
text.en-trans: chi nang barché zhiwar jingyi lob

text.en: Through the blessings of praying in this way,
text.en-trans: detar solwa tabpé jinlab kyi

text.en: May I utterly renounce all worldly, samsaric action,
text.en-trans: jikten khorwé jawa rab pang né

text.en: Set out upon the pure, undeceiving path of the three secrets,
text.en-trans: sang sum namdak lumé lam zhuk té

text.en: And obtain the supreme, ultimate vajra secret!
text.en-trans: tartuk dorjé sangwa chok tob shok
